intro: Lomatogonium lijiangense, commonly known as the Yunnan lomatogonium, is a flowering plant native to China, specifically Yunnan Province. It belongs to the Asteraceae family, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant typically grows in mountainous regions and is adapted to temperate climates with well-drained soils. Its foliage is often hairy, and it produces small, yellowish flowers that bloom in the summer months. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endemic species in its native habitat.
